messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: Many big supermarkets have been criticised for doing many bad things in the last ten years. For example, they have wasted a lot of food, paid their suppliers too little, and made too much plastic waste with their packaging, which has damaged our environment. However, supermarkets are now starting to pay attention because many customers have complained about the large amount of plastic waste from packaging, so some of the biggest supermarkets in the UK have agreed to a plan to change their packaging and use less plastic.
